description: Try our easy to follow Feta & Kale Puffins (Pasta Muffins) recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury muffin,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Kale,Peanut free
name: Feta & Kale Puffins (Pasta Muffins) Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gradually whisk in milk and continue to stir for 3 minutes or until mixture has thickened. Add cheese, paprika and nutmeg, and stir to combine. Remove from the heat and allow sauce to cool slightly.
Add cooked macaroni, kale, carrot, zucchini and eggs, and stir to combine.
Divide mixture among 12 muffin holes. Place a few pieces of feta on top of each puffin. Cook in oven for 15 minutes or until lightly golden on top.
